title: What is an example of economic activity? - Quora

response.answer_text: trading of goods and services is a very good example of an economic activity. wholesaler or retailer bites a parody cut and then sells it to the next person in the supply chains in the case ped wholesaler next person will be retailer nest person will be the ultimate user/ consumer.

Let’s first understand the meaning of economic activity Economic activity is process of production,distribution,exchange and consumption of commodity. Example:- any Activity Where financial motive is involved like production of good in industry or selling of product in any market are taken as an example of economical activity.
